text:
{
  "warehouses": [
    {
      "size": "X-Small",
      "code": "XS",
      "credits_per_hour": 1,
      "memory_gb": 8,
      "vcpu": 2,
      "typical_use": "Light queries, development"
    },
    {
      "size": "Small",
      "code": "S",
      "credits_per_hour": 2,
      "memory_gb": 16,
      "vcpu": 4,
      "typical_use": "Standard analytical queries"
    },
    {
      "size": "Medium",
      "code": "M",
      "credits_per_hour": 4,
      "memory_gb": 32,
      "vcpu": 8,
      "typical_use": "Heavy queries, multiple users"
    },
    {
      "size": "Large",
      "code": "L",
      "credits_per_hour": 8,
      "memory_gb": 64,
      "vcpu": 16,
      "typical_use": "Complex transformations, ML workloads"
    },
    {
      "size": "X-Large",
      "code": "XL",
      "credits_per_hour": 16,
      "memory_gb": 128,
      "vcpu": 32,
      "typical_use": "Large-scale ML, heavy concurrent usage"
    },
    {
      "size": "2X-Large",
      "code": "2XL",
      "credits_per_hour": 32,
      "memory_gb": 256,
      "vcpu": 64,
      "typical_use": "Enterprise-scale ML pipelines"
    },
    {
      "size": "3X-Large",
      "code": "3XL",
      "credits_per_hour": 64,
      "memory_gb": 512,
      "vcpu": 128,
      "typical_use": "Massive parallel processing"
    },
    {
      "size": "4X-Large",
      "code": "4XL",
      "credits_per_hour": 128,
      "memory_gb": 1024,
      "vcpu": 256,
      "typical_use": "Extreme workloads"
    },
    {
      "size": "5X-Large",
      "code": "5XL",
      "credits_per_hour": 256,
      "memory_gb": 2048,
      "vcpu": 512,
      "typical_use": "Specialized high-capacity needs"
    },
    {
      "size": "6X-Large",
      "code": "6XL",
      "credits_per_hour": 512,
      "memory_gb": 4096,
      "vcpu": 1024,
      "typical_use": "Maximum capacity workloads"
    }
  ]
}
